von mir ein must have für jeden spieler der die heruasforderung sucht.

[Cons]

-Shit teammates
-Tons of cheaters
-Ranks are messed up
-64 tick servers still

[Pros]

-Practice really shows
-3rd party clients have 128 tick servers and a great anti-cheat
-Skins are cool to collect and you can make money trading
-Fun times with friends

Let me just say this, its only good if you have prime status. If youre just playing the free version then good luck going against hackers, smurfs, etc. Otherwise its really fun, especially custom modes

This game is filled with a variety of people who can be good and bad. The main attraction of this game is competitive, which can be quite bothersome at times because most of the time, randoms I queue up with either don't have mics or simply just can't co-operate with their team mates. This game is definitely tactical and complex, which makes the game so enjoying and exciting. The spray patterns, the call outs, the marketing system, every little detail and thing is what makes this game so much fun compared to other FPS games. But yet, it is also simple. I've been playing this game ever since I was in elementary school, I remember I would always play on my friends' servers and we would play Death Run, Hide N' Seek, Parkour and so much more. I bought this game before it became free, and I can say that CS:GO definitely got better overtime when I started getting back into it not too long ago. This game is toxic ONLY if you make it toxic, like I said, the community is filled with a variety of people. But, from my personal experience, most of it is good. I highly recommend this game if you're seeking danger, excitement and more variety. This game is one of the main games I play with my close friends and I can say we have a lot of fun playing this game. Overall, I would give this game a 10 out of 10. 10 divided by 10 is 1, therefore, this game is number 1. On the free to play section of course.
